backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law - 57 Bond Street

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 331-2020 to designate 57 Bond Street (Toronto Centre, Ward 13) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.
